charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1101_0100:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] encountered
Sabrina and May having a Pokémon battle in
the woods.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1101_0200:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] watched the bout for a moment before it
came to a close.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_0500: I’ll see the two of you later.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_0700:
Oh! I didn’t see you
there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_0401_0900:
Oh, really? So you only saw part of the
battle, then.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_0402_1100: I see, you were letting us focus on the battle.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_1200:
Although...it was more of Sabrina helping me train
than it was a battle.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_1300:
She seems really interested in Latias’s ability to
read my emotions.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_1400: So I asked her to have a battle with me.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_1500:
When Latias and I first formed a sync pair, we
never really sought out battles.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_0301_1600: Did you do other fun things?
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_0401_1700:
Yeah! My Latias has always loved hanging out and
having fun with me!
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_0402_1900:
I wouldn’t say that. We just started out more
like playmates or friends.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_2000:
I met Latias one day while I was taking a break
from doing fieldwork.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_2100:
I was feeding the Pokémon some candies called
Pokéblocks and playing with them when Latias
approached me.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_2200:
Latias don’t usually appear in front of people, but
this one seems to be curious by nature.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_2300:
The more we played together, the deeper our
friendship became.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_2400:
But when I battled with my other Pokémon,
I noticed that Latias would always stare at me.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_2500:
I started wondering why that could be...
Then it hit me.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_2600:
Latias was trying to use her telepathy to tell me
she wanted to battle, too!
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_2700:
Since then, we’ve sought out all sorts of Pokémon
battles together!
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_0402_3100: I can’t really understand what she’s saying...
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_3200: But I can understand Latias’s thoughts.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_3300:
Even without using telepathy, I think I know exactly
how she feels.
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_3400:
Chatting is nice and all, but battling sounds way
more fun!
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_3900: Let’s give it our all, Latias!
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_4000:
We can test out what we learned from our
last battle!
charaepi_ch0126_41_haruka/2301_1201_4100:
Time to show them how in sync we are on
the battlefield!
